title: (x) Fashion Week Mexico 2007 striped geometric sans - ITC Aki Lines {Katelynn Martin}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122015712im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/FWM07_6234.jpg)

Does anybody know what’s the name of the main font used in this composition?

Looks like and kind of reminds me of the one Lance Wyman created for the Olympic Games in 1968...

 [‹ (x) Compressed sans in Feltron’s annual report - Opti Giant {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122015712/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47969 "Go to previous forum topic") [70s style bold italic display face w/ swashes ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122015712/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48084 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TristanMX

comments.content: Alright, I knew I’d seen this one before. It looks like it is ITC Aki Lines. That being impossible (as I have yet to hear of a digitization of it) it must be the emulation of Aki Lines on Dafont called [Akka](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122015712/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=akka&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=TIFFONT&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha). If I am wrong, someone correct me.
